datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to cooking techniques, gastronomy, and culinary traditions.

columns.name: local_supplier_partnerships
columns.description: Number of local suppliers from which the chef sources ingredients

columns.name: chef_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each chef

columns.name: culinary_competition_participation
columns.description: Number of culinary competitions the chef participates in annually

columns.name: cuisine_complexity
columns.description: A score representing the complexity of the cuisine type the chef specializes in

columns.name: region_climate
columns.description: Climatic condition of the region the chef works in

columns.name: years_of_experience
columns.description: Number of years the chef has been professionally cooking

columns.name: cooking_method_preference
columns.description: Primary cooking method preferred by the chef

columns.name: chef_experience
columns.description: Number of years of professional cooking experience the chef has

columns.name: chef_innovation_score
columns.description: A numerical score from 1 to 100 representing the chef's tendency to innovate and try new culinary methods

columns.name: international_competitions_attended
columns.description: Number of international culinary competitions the chef has attended

columns.name: gastronomic_techniques_count
columns.description: The count of different gastronomic techniques used by the chef

columns.name: seasonal_ingredient_usage
columns.description: Percentage of ingredients that are seasonal in the chef's dishes

columns.name: has_formal_culinary_education
columns.description: Indicates whether the chef has formal culinary education

columns.name: participation_in_culinary_innovation_programs
columns.description: Binary indicator of the chef's involvement in any culinary innovation programs focused on modern cooking techniques and ingredients

columns.name: number_of_signature_dishes
columns.description: Total number of signature dishes a chef has developed

columns.name: cuisine_specialty
columns.description: Type of cuisine the chef specializes in

columns.name: ingredients_diversity_score
columns.description: A score representing the diversity of ingredients used by the chef

columns.name: uses_international_flavors
columns.description: Indicates whether the chef incorporates international flavors into their cuisine

columns.name: menu_change_frequency
columns.description: Number of times the chef changes the menu annually

columns.name: preferred_cooking_method
columns.description: Primary cooking method preferred by the chef

columns.name: number_of_awards
columns.description: Total number of culinary awards won by the chef

columns.name: menu_items_count
columns.description: Total number of different dishes available on the chef's menu

queries.question: Is there a relationship between formal culinary education, cuisine complexity, chef experience, menu change frequency, seasonal ingredient usage, and cuisine specialty?
queries.true_hypothesis: Chefs who have high cuisine complexity scores and formal culinary education, and whose menu change frequency, seasonal ingredient usage, and chef experience score collectively indicate a French cuisine specialization, tend to specialize in French cuisine. Those with criteria indicating an Indian cuisine specialization tend to specialize in Indian cuisine. Chefs meeting the criteria for Chinese cuisine tend to specialize in Chinese cuisine, while others lean towards Italian cuisine.
queries.true_hypothesis_expr: np.where((df['cuisine_complexity'] * 5 + (df['has_formal_culinary_education'] * 3) > 25) & ((df['menu_change_frequency'] * 4 + df['seasonal_ingredient_usage'] * 2 + df['chef_experience']) / 3 > 60), 'French', np.where((df['cuisine_complexity'] * 5 + (df['has_formal_culinary_education'] * 3) > 20) & ((df['menu_change_frequency'] * 4 + df['seasonal_ingredient_usage'] * 2 + df['chef_experience']) / 3 > 45), 'Indian', np.where((df['cuisine_complexity'] * 5 + (df['has_formal_culinary_education'] * 3) <= 20) & ((df['menu_change_frequency'] * 4 + df['seasonal_ingredient_usage'] * 2 + df['chef_experience']) / 3 <= 45), 'Chinese', 'Italian')))
